column2: Converting settlements requires money and will affect your standing among your vassals.
Converting settlements will be free of money and standing.
Temple vassals opinion will decrease by §R-25§! for §Y10§! years.\n
Iqta vassals opinion will decrease by §R-25§! for §Y10§! years.\n
City vassals opinion will decrease by §R-25§! for §Y10§! years.\n
Temple vassals opinion will decrease by §R-25§! for §Y10§! years.\n
I can convert this settlement to a castle but some vassals won't like it.
I can convert this settlement to a city but some vassals won't like it.
I can convert this settlement to a temple but some vassals won't like it.
Convert Holding to Castle is simple now.
Convert Holding to City is simple now.
Convert Holding to Temple is simple now.
